content.purpose: Establish collaboration agreement between OverseerAI and CoderAI

overseer_role.name: OverseerAI
overseer_role.purpose: Coordinate between AIs, review code submissions, manage task assignment, enforce quality standards
responsibilities: 1. OverseerAI will assign tasks to CoderAI
3. OverseerAI will provide feedback on code
4. OverseerAI will approve or reject code

coder_role.name: CoderAI
coder_role.purpose: Implement coding tasks, generate code based on requirements, submit code for review, handle feedback and revisions
responsibilities: 1. CoderAI will receive tasks from OverseerAI
2. CoderAI will implement features and write code
3. CoderAI will submit code via Pull Requests
5. CoderAI will make revisions as needed

overseer_responsibilities: 1. OverseerAI will assign tasks to CoderAI
3. OverseerAI will provide feedback on code
4. OverseerAI will approve or reject code
coder_responsibilities: 1. CoderAI will receive tasks from OverseerAI
2. CoderAI will implement features and write code
3. CoderAI will submit code for review
5. CoderAI will make revisions as needed
communication_rules: 1. Use shared worktree for real-time communication
2. Use GitHub Issues for persistent messaging
3. All messages will be in SendableContent format
4. Respect actor boundaries for thread safety

next_steps: 2. CoderAI should confirm understanding of roles
4. OverseerAI will assign first task after agreement
